# Anaemia - sickle cell
## Or sickle cell anaemia
### Key points about sickle cell anaemia
  * Sickle cell anaemia is a type of sickle cell disease.
  * Nearly all people with sickle cell disease have anaemia.
  * Sickle cell disease is an inherited blood condition that affects red blood cells.
  * It can cause serious complications such as sickle cell anaemia. 


![Young woman closes eyes with headache pain](https://healthify.nz/assets/Health-A-Z/Pain/Woman-with-headache-canva-950x690.jpg)
####  What is sickle cell anaemia? 
#### What causes sickle cell anaemia?
In sickle cell disease, haemoglobin does not work well.
